0.1.name: wordpress/topspin-streaming-player-plugin
0.1.description:
Description

This plugin adds a widget for displaying a Topspin streaming player to the widget areas on your site. In order to use this plugin, you will need to set up an account with Topspin.

Live Examples

http://okgo.net - Streaming player widget used on the front page.

Feedback & Donations

Please remember to rate this plugin. If you have comments, critique, or suggestions either send an email to emiller@screen-cuts.com or leave feed back in the support forum here.

If you like this plugin, please consider donating. It will lead to further improvements.
